units.title: FACS sorting and preculture of LGR5+ intestinal stem cells
units.text: Single LGR5+ intestinal stem cells were isolated via FACS and precultured for 3 days under stem cell maintenance conditions (day 0 seeding, ENR CV days 0–3).
units.rationale: This is a clear, actionable protocol step describing cell isolation and initial culture conditions.

units.title: Differentiation induction by removal of CV
units.text: On day 3, CV was removed from the culture, and organoids differentiated under ENR conditions for up to 3 days.
units.rationale: This describes a precise temporal intervention in the protocol to trigger differentiation.

units.title: Organoid isolation and processing on DisCo platform
units.text:
For each day during development (S0–S3), individual organoids were isolated, dissociated and processed on the DisCo platform.
